title: Winter 1929: de Stadhuis-Brand te Leiden. Ijmuiden, 29 April 1930: wereld's grootste ships Geopend
brief_description: Winter 1929 - footage of firefighting, showing the use of heavy hosing. Water icing over in buildings in the middle of winter after putting fires out. Ijmuiden 29th April 1930 - footage of dams and huge water reservoir and steamship docking from the Netherlands with a caption about the “Johan Van Oldenbarmetelt” with the Kooninklijke family on board.
